name: TopItUp
description:
#TopItUpPizzaJam

TopItUp, memory game for the Pizza Jam that runs from Friday June 8th until Sunday the 10th of 2018.

I advise you to play it in the desktop version, rather than browser, however, the game is functional enough to be played on browser, but the menu seems to be buggy.

Credits: Programming and Music:

Fran Grande

Art:

Dominic Butler

Fonts by:

Des in fontspace

Sharkshock in fontspace

Controls for keyboard:

Arrow keys                                  Move the topping 

Enter or Space:                                  Place topping 

Q or E:                            Previous or Next topping

Controls for pad:

Left Stick or D-Pad                 Move the topping 

A button                                                 Place topping

Lb or Rb                        Previous or Next topping
